welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lucena, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lucena has to offer.

restaurants.name: Peixada do Geraldo
restaurants.description: Peixada do Geraldo is a seafood restaurant located in Lucena.

restaurants.name: Restaurante e Pizzaria Pôr do Sol
restaurants.description: Restaurante e Pizzaria Pôr do Sol is a pizzeria located in Lucena.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iloilo International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: New Terminal
terminals.description: The new terminal at Iloilo International Airport is currently under construction and expected to open in 2021.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
